description: Police say the man in his 30s has been bailed pending further investigation.
title: Man arrested after mother assaulted in Exeter park
title_page: Man arrested after mother assaulted in Exeter park - BBC News
maintext:
A man has been arrested following a "suspicious incident" in an Exeter park, police have said.
Officers from Devon and Cornwall Police were called to Exhibition Fields between Exhibition Way and Beacon Heath at about 14:45 GMT on Thursday after receiving reports a man had assaulted a mother pushing her children in a pram.
The force said a man in his 30s from Exeter was arrested in connection with the incident and had been released on bail pending further inquiries.
A police spokesperson said anyone who witnessed suspicious activity in the park between 13:00 GMT and 15:00 GMT on Thursday should contact investigating officers or Crimestoppers.
